name: Edward Graham
description: My name is Lieutenant Graham Edward ,Am White/Caucasian.I’m a major in the US marine serving in the western part of africa presently.I have a good sense of humor…. I was born in Pelham, Goargia, an urban city more than 2003000 residents,Age (42yrs).I’m a widower been widowed for 12yrs and since then been single.After the sudden and devastating death of my wife,Who was a wonderful,sweet and caring wife and mother..Have been single for the past 12 years, am a man with a strong heart,loving, caring, honest, compassionate,affectionate,
